    POSTED BY Vicky Pham · Apr 9, 2019

They share with us how ZGZG uses Quire to track tasks and boost productivity across their community. continue reading
  • dreams
    Dream Chasers: Making a Safer and Cleaner Space Environment
    POSTED BY Vicky Pham · Feb 26, 2019
    Space pollution is indeed a growing problem, but may not be so obvious or visible to people on earth. Alexandre de Villardi de Montlaur and his team are among scientists and engineers trying to solve this problem. Alexandre, coordinator of the most significant project, the ECE3SAT project at ECE Paris, shares with us on how Quire has supported his team in designing a deboriting satellite that seeks to resolve this growing issue. continue reading
